## useTokenBalance() function

Get the token balance of a specified wallet

## Example

```jsx
import { useProgram, useTokenBalance } from "@web3sdks/react/solana";

export default function Component() {
  const { program } = useProgram("{{program_address}}");
  const { data: balance, isLoading } = useTokenBalance(
    program,
    "{{wallet_address}}",
  );

  return <p>{balance}</p>;
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useTokenBalance(
  program: RequiredParam<Token>,
  walletAddress: RequiredParam<string>,
): import("@tanstack/react-query").UseQueryResult<
  {
    value: string;
    displayValue: string;
  },
  unknown
>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type                        | Description                                     |
| ------------- | --------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- |
| program       | RequiredParam&lt;Token&gt;  | The token program to get the balance on         |
| walletAddress | RequiredParam&lt;string&gt; | The address of the wallet to get the balance of |

**Returns:**

import("@tanstack/react-query").UseQueryResult&lt;{ value: string; displayValue: string; }, unknown&gt;
